short_summary: The Construction Research Centre is seeking a Standing Offer to develop technical content for the Canadian National Master Construction Specification.
description: The Construction Research Centre is responsible for managing the Canadian National Master Construction Specification, an essential tool for design and construction documentation in Canada. To remain relevant, the Specification requires ongoing revisions and new content. The scope of work for this Standing Offer is to provide technical writing services to develop new and update existing content in the Canadian National Master Construction Specification (NMS).
